Skip to contents
DTExtend 1.3.1.9000
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    DT_add_bars()
    Add styleColorBar or styleDivergentBar to datatable
    DT_button_extend()
    Create a list to configure Datatable Buttons extension options The Icons page demonstrates the structure of the Buttons extended options
    DT_callback()
    Custom datatable callback Javascript
    DT_filter_chr()
    Create DT formatted filter statements from a list of filter ranges
    DT_filter_restore()
    Transforms the DT search_columns input into the searchCols option list
    DT_formatNum() DT_formatNum()
    Format numbers in a datatable
    DT_header_tooltips()
    Add Tippy tooltips to headers
    DT_hide_col()
    Determine the index of a column name to hide
    DT_options_update()
    Update datatable options
    DT_style_row()
    Style rows of a datatable using source_cols/ID
    DT_style_row_color()
    Create a call to styleRow for matching color to backgroundColor for contrast
    styleDivergentBar()
    Style DT divergent color bar
    useDTExtend()
    Include in the DOM to provide supporting dependencies for this package

    Developed by Stephen Holsenbeck.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
